projects.title: AI-Powered Task Manager
projects.description: A smart task management system that uses AI to prioritize and suggest tasks based on user behavior and deadlines.

projects.title: Blockchain Voting System
projects.description: A secure and transparent voting system built on blockchain technology to ensure tamper-proof elections.

projects.title: AR Home Decorator
projects.description: An augmented reality app that allows users to visualize furniture and decor in their home before purchasing.

projects.title: Eco-Friendly Travel Planner
projects.description: A travel planning app that helps users create itineraries with the lowest carbon footprint.

projects.title: Decentralized Social Media Platform
projects.description: A social media platform built on decentralized technologies to ensure user privacy and data ownership.
